heading: HR00506
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE POSSIBLE IMPOSITION OF STRICTER IMPORT REQUIREMENTS AND GUIDELINES AND OTHER ENFORCEABLE MEASURES ON FRESH, FROZEN, PROCESSED PORK PRODUCTS, AND BY-PRODUCTS TO CONTAIN THE AFRICAN SWINE FEVER (ASF) VIRUS IN THE COUNTRY
status: Pending with the Committee on AGRICULTURE AND FOOD since 2020-03-10
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00506
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE POSSIBLE IMPOSITION OF STRICTER IMPORT REQUIREMENTS AND GUIDELINES AND OTHER ENFORCEABLE MEASURES ON FRESH, FROZEN, PROCESSED PORK PRODUCTS, AND BY-PRODUCTS TO CONTAIN THE AFRICAN SWINE FEVER (ASF) VIRUS IN THE COUNTRY
